```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
> groups = data.frame(id = 1:4, content = c("Outreaching", "System/Platform Changes", "Xmas Shutdown Period", "Key Milestone"))
> timevis(dt, groups, width = 900)
> library(timevis)
> 
> data <- data.frame(
+     id      = 1:4,
+     content = c("Course start", "Study progress report",
+                 "Seminar-version of project", "Examinaton seminar"),
+     start   = c("2022-01-17", "2022-02-14",
+                 "2022-05-09", "2022-05-18"),
+     end     = c(NA, NA, NA, NA)
+ )
> 
> timevis(data)
```
